test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: Login to the application using Selenium and retrieve session cookie

test-method.name: GetEmpStatus
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses?limit=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Print and verify the response status code and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

exception.message: GetEmpStatus must be implementated using the Rest assured methods only! expected [true] but found [false]
